languages.text: "Трофеев, говоришь..." {n}Маражай бросает на вас взгляд, после чего подчеркнуто обращает все свое внимание к Каллигосу.{/n} "В тебе живет ярость убийцы и жажда крови, мон-кай. Мне по душе то, как ты видишь мир... и скот вокруг тебя. Быть может, я выбрал не того Вольного Торговца? И должен сменить свиту, чтобы присоединиться к твоей охоте?"

"Trophies, you say..." {n}Marazhai glances at you, then pointedly turns all his attention to Calligos.{/n} "In you live the rage and bloodthirst of a killer, mon-keigh. The way you see the world and the cattle around you is to my liking. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue and join your hunt?"
languages.original_text: "Трофеев, говоришь..." {n}Маражай бросает на вас взгляд, после чего подчеркнуто обращает все свое внимание к Каллигосу.{/n} "В тебе живет ярость убийцы и жажда крови, мон-кай. Мне по душе то, как ты видишь мир... и скот вокруг тебя. Быть может, я выбрал не того Вольного Торговца? И должен сменить свиту, чтобы присоединиться к твоей охоте?"

I like how you see the world and the cattle around you. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue so as to join your hunt?"

I like how you see the world and the cattle around you. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue so as to join your hunt?"

I like how you see the world and the cattle around you. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue to join your hunt?"

I like how you see the world and the cattle around you. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue to join your hunt?"

The way you see the world and the cattle around you is to my liking. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue and join your hunt?"

"Trophies, you say..." {n}Marazhai glances at you, then pointedly turns all his attention to Calligos.{/n} "In you live the rage and bloodthirst of a killer, mon-keigh. The way you see the world and the cattle around you is to my liking. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue and join your hunt?"

languages.text: «Así que trofeos...». {n}Marazhai te mira de soslayo, luego toda su atención se centra en Calligos.{/n} «Albergas en tu interior la furia y la sed de sangre de un asesino, mon-keigh. Me gusta tu visión del mundo y del ganado que te rodea. ¿Quizá me he equivocado de Comerciante Independiente? ¿Y si cambio de séquito para unirme a tu cacería?».
languages.original_text: "Trophies, you say..." {n}Marazhai glances at you, then pointedly turns all his attention to Calligos.{/n} "In you live the rage and bloodthirst of a killer, mon-keigh. The way you see the world and the cattle around you is to my liking. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue and join your hunt?"

traits.locale_text: «Así que trofeos...». {n}Marazhai te mira de soslayo, luego toda su atención se centra en Calligos.{/n} «Albergas en tu interior la furia y la sed de sangre de un asesino, mon-keigh. Me gusta tu visión del mundo y del ganado que te rodea. ¿Quizá me he equivocado de Comerciante Independiente? ¿Y si cambio de séquito para unirme a tu cacería?».

languages.text: “你说猎物……”{n}玛拉斋看了你一眼，随后所有注意力都转向了卡里戈斯。{/n}“你身上带着杀手一样的怒火与嗜血，猴子。我很喜欢你对待这个世界和你身边那群畜生的方式。或许我选错了行商浪人？或许我应该换个队伍，加入你的狩猎？”
languages.original_text: "Trophies, you say..." {n}Marazhai glances at you, then pointedly turns all his attention to Calligos.{/n} "In you live the rage and bloodthirst of a killer, mon-keigh. The way you see the world and the cattle around you is to my liking. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue and join your hunt?"

traits.locale_text: “你说战利品……”{n}玛拉斋看了你一眼，随后所有注意力都转向了卡里戈斯。{/n}“你身上带着杀手一样的怒火与嗜血，猴子。我很喜欢你对待世界和你身边那群畜生的方式。或许我选错了行商浪人？或许我应该换个队伍，加入你的狩猎？”

languages.text: « Des trophées, vous dites... » {n}Marazhai vous lance un regard appuyé avant de tourner toute son attention vers Calligos.{/n} « Je sens en vous la fureur et la soif de sang d'un tueur, mon-keigh. J'apprécie la façon dont vous voyez le monde et le bétail qui vous entoure. Je me suis peut-être trompé en choisissant {mf|ce libre-marchand|cette libre-marchande}. Je me demande si je ne devrais pas changer de cortège et me joindre à votre partie de chasse. »
languages.original_text: "Trophies, you say..." {n}Marazhai glances at you, then pointedly turns all his attention to Calligos.{/n} "In you live the rage and bloodthirst of a killer, mon-keigh. The way you see the world and the cattle around you is to my liking. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue and join your hunt?"

traits.locale_text: « Des trophées, vous dites... » {n}Marazhai vous lance un regard avant de tourner toute son attention vers Calligos.{/n} « Je sens en vous la fureur et la soif de sang d'un tueur, mon-keigh. J'aime la façon dont vous voyez le monde et le bétail qui vous entoure. Je me suis peut-être trompé en choisissant {mf|ce libre-marchand|cette libre-marchande}. Je me demande si je ne devrais pas changer de cortège et me joindre à votre partie de chasse. »

languages.text: 「戦利品だと…」{n}マラズハイは、あなたをチラリと見た後、カリゴスに全神経を向けた。{/n}「お前の中には殺人者の怒りと血の渇きが宿っているようだな、モン＝ケイ。お前の世界と家畜に対する見方が気に入った。俺は自由開拓者選びを間違えたかもしれんな？付き従う相手を変えて、お前の狩りに参加すべきか？」
languages.original_text: "Trophies, you say..." {n}Marazhai glances at you, then pointedly turns all his attention to Calligos.{/n} "In you live the rage and bloodthirst of a killer, mon-keigh. The way you see the world and the cattle around you is to my liking. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue and join your hunt?"

traits.locale_text: 「戦利品だと…」{n}マラズハイは、あなたをチラリと見た後、カリゴスに全神経を向けた。{/n}「お前の中には殺人者の怒りと血の渇きが宿っているようだな、モン＝ケイ。お前の世界と家畜に対する見方が気に入った。俺は自由開拓者選びを間違えたかもしれんな？付き従う相手を変えて、お前の狩りに参加すべきか？」

languages.text: "Trophäen, sagt Ihr ..." {n}Marazhai blickt dich an und richtet dann deutlich und betont seine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit auf Calligos.{/n} "In Euch leben der Zorn und der Blutdurst eines Mörders, Chem-Pan-Sey. Mir gefällt Eure Sicht auf die Welt und das Vieh um Euch herum. Vielleicht habe ich den falschen Freihändler gewählt? Vielleicht sollte ich das Gefolge wechseln und mich Eurer Jagd anschließen?"
languages.original_text: "Trophies, you say..." {n}Marazhai glances at you, then pointedly turns all his attention to Calligos.{/n} "In you live the rage and bloodthirst of a killer, mon-keigh. The way you see the world and the cattle around you is to my liking. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue and join your hunt?"

traits.locale_text: "Trophäen, sagt Ihr ..." {n}Marazhai blickt dich an und richtet dann deutlich und betont seine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit auf Calligos.{/n} "In Euch leben der Zorn und der Blutdurst eines Mörders, Chem-Pan-Sey. Mir gefällt Eure Sicht auf die Welt und das Vieh um Euch herum. Vielleicht habe ich den falschen Freihändler gewählt? Vielleicht sollte ich das Gefolge wechseln und mich Eurer Jagd anschließen?"

languages.text: "Ganimetler demek..." {n}Marazhai, sana bakış atıyor. Ardından tüm dikkatini açıkça Calligos'a çeviriyor.{/n} "İçinde bir katilin öfkesini ve kana susamışlığını barındırıyorsun mon-keigh. Dünyaya ve etrafındaki sürüye bakış açın tam bana göre. Belki de yanlış Hür Tacir'i seçmişimdir. Belki de maiyet değiştirip senin avına katılmalıyım..."
languages.original_text: "Trophies, you say..." {n}Marazhai glances at you, then pointedly turns all his attention to Calligos.{/n} "In you live the rage and bloodthirst of a killer, mon-keigh. The way you see the world and the cattle around you is to my liking. Perhaps I chose the wrong Rogue Trader? Perhaps I should change retinue and join your hunt?"
